name: Chegg
description: Chegg was an educational technology company that provided textbook rentals, homework help, online tutoring, and scholarship search services to students.

name: Stack Overflow
description: Stack Overflow was a question and answer website for programmers. It featured questions and answers on a wide range of topics in computer programming.

name: Fiverr
description: Fiverr was an online marketplace for freelance services. It connected businesses with freelancers offering digital services in writing, graphic design, video editing, programming, and more.
